title: Emerald Legacy Jhumka - A Timeless Blend of Tradition and Elegance
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features ethically sourced Emeralds with excellent color saturation and White Cubic Zirconia (CZ) diamonds. South Sea Pearls hang elegantly from the bottom.
features: These statement Jhumkas showcase a contemporary design inspired by traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The geometric arrangement of the CZ diamonds creates a dazzling halo around the central emerald stones. The pear-shaped emeralds cascade downwards and are complemented by delicate South Sea Pearls. The intricate openwork allows light to beautifully illuminate each stone. Features a secure post and clip closure for comfortable wear.
colors: and the warm yellow glow of the 22K Gold.
occasions: and festive gatherings. A captivating choice for a modern bride or anyone wanting to add a touch of timeless elegance to their attire.
description: These Jhumkas seamlessly blend tradition with modern design sensibilities. The Emeralds represent prosperity and good fortune, while the gold symbolizes purity. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, long-lasting sheen. A heirloom-quality piece that can be passed down through generations.
